fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Paralysis: When a player has 4 or more stacks of poison, they are unable to defend against any attacks. Does not affect yourself or your Chaos teammates.
- Caustic: When a player has 2 or more stacks of poison, they draw 1-2 less cards at the end of the phase. Does not affect yourself or your Chaos teammates.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Poison: Pick a player. They gain 2 stacks of Poison immediately. Cannot be used during Rollover/Peacetime. [4 uses, 1 CD]
- Concoct: Change a card into Poison! (Reforged) [Infinite, 2 CD]
- Antidote: Play a Heal! (Reforged) on someone. [3 uses]
- Veinlock: Pick a player. Their poison cannot be cleansed this phase, however this deactivates Paralysis on that specific player for this phase as well. [2 uses, Unique]
